column1: I put ‘from’ in capital letters to highlight the media implication that few are dying FROM the corona virus – just dying WITH the virus present. This trick isn’t limited to the sick and elderly: the overwhelming majority of ‘coverage’ has abruptly substituted FROM for WITH.
